Pembroke_Pines.Hollywood Fashion Center: The Hollywood Fashion Center was a shopping mall located at the South East corner of Hollywood Boulevard (State Road 820) and US 441 (State Road 7) in Hollywood, Florida. The mall opened in 1972, and had four anchor stores: JCPenney, Richard's (later Zayre/Ames), Burdines and Jordan Marsh. With the opening of Pembroke Lakes Mall six miles west in Pembroke Pines in 1992, JCPenney and Burdines to the bigger stores at Pembroke Lakes Mall although Jordan Marsh closed in 1991.
